affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target, Point Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: An icy blast followed by a wave of fire launches out in a path in front of Jakiro. The ice slows enemies, while the fire delivers damage over time.
notes:
Can hit units up to 1000 range away.
Has a 0.3 second interval between each breath.
attrib:
START RADIUS: 200/200/200/200
END RADIUS: 250/250/250/250
BURN DAMAGE: 16/36/56/76
MOVE SLOW: 28%/32%/36%/40%
ATTACK SLOW: 28/32/36/40
DURATION: 5
cmb:
135/140/155/170
10
lore: Pyrexae dragons have tremendously dangerous breath for each branch of the species; combining them is unimaginable.
name: jakiro_dual_breath

affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemies that touch it.
notes: It takes 0.5 seconds for the path to reach its full extent.
cmb:
90
12/11/10/9
lore: Jakiro's cunning right head calls upon its frozen heritage, glazing the earth with blistering cold.
name: jakiro_ice_path

affects:
ABILITY: Auto-Cast, Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc:
Jakiro burns his enemies in an area of effect with fire added to his attack, while slowing their attacks.
Liquid Fire is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
notes: Works on both units and buildings.
cmb: 20/15/10/4
lore: The left maw of Jakiro opens, laying waste to any in its path.
name: jakiro_liquid_fire

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target, Point Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc:
Jakiro exhales a wide line of lasting flames, which deals damage per second to any enemy units caught in the fire.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes: Macropyre destroys trees in its path.
attrib:

FLAME LENGTH: 900
FLAME WIDTH: 240
DURATION: 10
SCEPTER DAMAGE PER SECOND: 125/175/225
SCEPTER FLAME LENGTH: 1800
SCEPTER DURATION: 20
cmb:

60
lore: Ice and fire combine to rip the battlefield to shreds with extreme temperatures.
name: jakiro_macropyre
